name: Jordan and his Gun
description:
!!!WARNING!!! THIS ISNT AN ACTUAL GAME YET, THIS IS A PREVIEW OF THE GAME !!!WARNING!!!

Please use this game to give me feedback, on what I can add to the game, or fix any bugs.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

NEW!!! Dev Build 1.0.0.2:
- New Cursor
- Gun reloading

Jordan loves to shoot the crap out of everything he sees. Try to use his gun to get some chocolate at the supermarket. (a story coming into the final game)

Roadmap: https://trello.com/b/0TVreHUQ/jordan-and-his-gun
